description: This file defines the main landing page component for a Next.js application using React. It includes UI elements such as headers, action cards linking to JIRA, Confluence, and connection management pages, as well as a chat input component with recent reference tracking.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for the landing page, managing UI and state for recent reference selections.

methods.name: ActionCard
methods.description: Reusable component for rendering individual action cards in the quick actions grid.
